message.body: I just talked to Beth. I had a tough time hearing her. She treated the room. She is going to call me back later.
From what I could hear it sounds like there are things that need to be prepared better for treatment. Something about stuff in your closet & stuff under the bed.

This is one of the reasons I am very frustrated with Cindy. I asked her multiple times if there was anything else you need to do to get ready for treatment & she says No. Beth comes by and says Yes there is.
OK. I'll talk to Beth & I'll call you afterwards. When will you be available to talk?
But I also...can't live like that for months
So at some point I gave up
But I'm willing to give it another go
Beth said she did a full on treatment which is good. She said she dusted everywhere.
